summary: EXCESSIVE PLAY AND WANDER IN STEERING ON MY 2000 CHRYSLER LHS.  3 TRIPS TO DEALERSHIP, DEALERSHIP BLAMES ALIGNMENT AND TIRES.  HAVE TRIED 3 ALIGNMENTS, AND 2 COMPLETE SETS OF NEW TIRES.  VEHICLE IS UNSAFE TO DRIVE AT HIGHWAY SPEEDS.  HAVE SEEN NUMEROUS COMPLAINTS OF SAME NATURE ON VARIOUS WEBSITES AS WELL AS NHTSA.  *NLM
